laboratory_examinations.findings: 150 mg/day initially; increased to 300 mg/day later.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial improvement in outlook and preoccupation, but deteriorated after observing her vascular markings in the mirror without make-up.
Condition continued to improve over 6 months.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 300 mg/day initially, later 300 mg/day during a 5-week trial.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Stopped believing that his facial appearance was abnormal, leading to improved social functioning over 4 months.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 200 mg/day initially, 6 weeks later showed abated concern.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Levels of anxiety and depression lessened during 4 months of follow-up.
Discontinued after skin rash, obsessive thoughts returned.
Symptom improvement was noted after returning to this medication.
